shows.title: Stepping Stones to a New Economy
shows.desc:
The time for incremental changes and tweaks to the status quo are over. We need a new economic model that works for people and planet. What are the building blocks of this new economic model and how do we get there?

The Chief Executive of the New Economics Foundation, Miatta Fahnbulleh is at the forefront of new ideas to reshape our economy and change people’s lives.

shows.title: The Daily Mirror
shows.desc: Featuring the festival’s smartest thinkers, artists and activists, including you! Cole Moreton helps us look beyond the headlines to try and work out what’s really going on in the world. Come prepared to listen, laugh and have your say.
